SELECT o.o_number o_number, o.o_date o_date, o.o_status o_status, o.o_total o_total, o.o_count o_count, b.b_title b_title FROM Orders o JOIN OrderDetail od ON o.o_number = od.o_number JOIN Book b ON od.b_code = b.b_code WHERE o.u_id = #{u_id} GROUP BY o.o_number;
SELECT o.o_number o_number, o.o_count o_count, o.o_date o_date, o.o_status o_status, b.b_title b_title FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN Book b ON o.b_code = b.b_code WHERE u_id = #{u_id};
SELECT b.b_title b_title, b.b_price b_price, b.b_img b_img, b.b_genre b_genre, b.b_like b_like, b.b_code b_code FROM BookLike L LEFT JOIN Book b ON L.b_code = b.b_code WHERE L.u_id = #{u_id};

SELECT r.r_content r_content, r.r_star r_star, r.r_id r_id, b.b_title b_title, b.b_genre b_genre, b.b_code b_code, b.b_img b_img FROM Review r LEFT JOIN Book b ON r.b_code = b.b_code WHERE u_id = #{u_id};

SELECT od.b_code , b.b_title, b.b_genre, b.b_img FROM OrderDetail od JOIN Book b ON od.b_code = b.b_code WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT r.b_code, r.u_id FROM Review r WHERE od.u_id = r.u_id AND od.b_Code = r.b_code) AND od.u_id = #{u_id} GROUP BY od.b_code;
